lead_paragraph: Two officers shot during a gun battle in Brooklyn on Saturday survived, and investigators were looking at the possibility that one was hit by a bullet fired by a fellow officer.

headline.print_headline: Origin of Bullet That Struck City Officer Remains Unclear
headline.main: Origin of Bullet That Struck New York Officer Remains Unclear, Police Say

snippet: Two officers shot during a gun battle in Brooklyn on Saturday survived, and investigators were looking at the possibility that one was hit by a bullet fired by a fellow officer.
abstract: Investigators confirm New York Police Officer Andrew Yurkiw was hit by bullet fired from suspect Frederick Funes following car chase in Bedford Stuyvesant, Brooklyn, but are unable to determine origin of bullet that hit Officer William Reddin; both officers survived incident.
